title: PS5 Pro is $700?!
description:
From this episode of Gamescast: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Jaq1vD5-EHM&t=17s

FOLLOW US ON EVERYWHERE!

transcript_chunks.text: I don't think this is the best way to show this like this should have been in the hands of journalists and digital Foundry and like that would have been a bigger sell for me and also like all of the comparisons that they're showing I'm like it looks pretty much the same I know it's not the same but of course with YouTube compression and everything but it was not a compelling argument for $700
